title: "I'm muting everyone the second the game starts and alt-tabbing until it does"
body:
This should be copy-pasted and said the instant queue pops if you're G3 or lower.  I mean let's be honest, no actual communication occurs here and 99% of chat is just flaming or trolling.

The flaming will still occur, but if the flaming is directed towards you, your teammates will say 'stfu idiot he muted you just play'.  And then people will finally play instead of type.

And maybe just once I can carry a clown fiesta team who wants to type about how Karma is 'purposeky steeling every1s kils report pls'

I hate this toxic game.

I mute EVERYONE at the start of the game.  
  I don't hesitate with the enemy team because I'm not playing the game to Talk or Chat with them PERIOD, INSTANT MUTE.

2.  Toxic players.

I don't have time to waste talking to them about s$it that doesn't matter at the end of the day.  I die teammate says "Why" or " you suck" yep I died or another teammate died it happens MOVE ON.

You lose lane and the game ever notice that same player who played with you 2-3 games before will say " Kill yourself, you suck, uninstall, etc" So you get the same generic answers over and over and over again. The chat is incredibly valuable for relaying complex information. Things such as "I'm splitpushing, please defend", "Please buy X item for Y reason", and many more things are hard to communicate in pings without anything being lost in translation.

Also, summoner spell cooldown messages are very useful. If flash and/or heal are down, ganks will be more effective until the spells are back up. Without flash, ganks are harder to escape, meanign you will more likely die.

TL;DR - Stop muting everyone if you have no reason to believe they are toxic. You can just wait until they call you something before you mute them.

We seem to be operating on completely different planes of existance.  I already explained that people in norms are chill, the experience is more laid back and people are nicer.

My post is directed towards a ranked game, where you seem to assume people are logical and can be reasoned with.  They are not and can not.  If someone spams "WHY WHY WHY WHY *ping* *ping* *ping*", there is nothing you can say.  They don't want you to say "well, I saw the Trist up top, and I figured that the Janna would be alone, so..", No, they don't want to hear that, they just want to flame and insult you.

Last game, I was mid, had a Kha sitting in the bush.  I was completely OOM and he kept pinging Ahri who was turret hugging.  I pinged him back, I pinged that my mana was gone and couldn't use any abilities.  I pinged to PLEASE not fight her.  I typed 'b' over and over in chat.

Did that stop him from turret diving an Ahri, eating charm, and giving her double buffs, ruining my lane, then flaming me for not flashing over 2 minion waves and autoing her under tower?  Nope.  Did it stop him from wandering around the enemy jungle at half HP, no wards, and everyone MIA?  Nope.  Did that stop him from throwing the rest of the game and purposely going in 1v5 because he was mad?  Nope.  Was there -anything- I could have done to salvage that game once he started throwing a tantrum for his own mistake?  Nope.

The people in this game at lower elo are garbage - they are in that elo BECAUSE of their inability to reason or work as a team.  You're toting 'aw just politely pls ask them to stop', and its ridiculous.  You can't reason with a raging 13 year old who giggles while he runs down mid for the 13th time.  You can't reason with a racist who just wants to spam obscenities in chat.  You can't reason with someone spam pinging the "?" on you for 15 solid minutes.  And you certainly can't carry them if they go out of their way to feed and throw because of them making bad decisions and blaming others for them.

Also, people are not only toxic when they are losing.  People are just toxic for the sake of being toxic.  Even if your team is ahead in ever way, people will find a way to insult you and throw the game over something ridiculous like taking red buff from adc or ks'ing from Riven.  I've had games where the support took a single cs from lane 25 min in, when we were leading, they just said 'stole cs bye' and quit for the rest of the game.  So no, people are not toxic only when losing.

If you try to be polite and communicate like a reasonable human being, you will be frustrated and disappointed over and over and over, and will eventually come to the conclusion that doing so is a waste of time.  Time that could be spent trying to carry and win the game.  Typing and communicating in this game leads to loss if you're anything lower than plat, almost guaranteed.

Honestly, once the flaming begins, I just want to ff20 and go afk until the game ends.  Teamwork at that point is done, coordination is done, and the chance of winning has dropped to less than 10%.
